page.title: 18 A Farm Near Beccles.
page.content: Mr Bannister farms 6 farms around Ringsfield.He has 400 hectares worked by 4 men and himself.In summer his father and students help.He grows crops of wheat,barley [for malting] sugar beet and potatoes.He uses 5 tractors,2 combines,1 hydraulic digger,1 bulldozer , 1 self-propelled sprayer and many attachments.It would cost over $200,000 to replace his machinery.He has 60 small fields on the farms.He used to have 120 milking cows but now he has 75 Hereford and Ger seys which are used for their meat. An old building on his Barsham farm goes back to Tudor times and there is a Tithe Barn on Lodge Farm. Mr Bannister drives a 4 wheel truck and carries a walkie-talkie on his belt to talk to his men.
